title: [Crazy Gravy]
description: Peculiar absinthe green moss blankets the floor of the hut with an overgrown, wildly feathery texture.  Scores of crude bone dolls are hung from the high ceiling, their primitive faces staring down vacantly over the room.  The burgeoning groundcover forks across a dark-glazed clay vessel and around the base of a skull-footed ebony table, creeping its way up into the corners of the vivid, paint-splashed walls.

Peculiar absinthe green moss blankets the floor of the hut with an overgrown, wildly feathery texture.  Scores of crude bone dolls are hung from the high ceiling, their primitive faces staring down vacantly over the room.  The burgeoning groundcover forks across a dark-glazed clay vessel and around the base of a skull-footed ebony table, creeping its way up into the corners of the vivid, paint-splashed walls.  A carved stonework cabinet wrapped with sprouting vines is nestled away in the shadiest corner of the space.
